resources: // Main Monty Python Trivia Monty Python Trivia - Results Monty Python Trivia Logo STOP! Welcome to the Bridge of Death! The old man from scene twenty-four "I'm the old man from scene twenty-four and who approacheth the Bridge of Death must answer me these questions three (ten, actually), and the other side he see." // Questions "Pretend you're called Loretta. Where would you keep your baby?" "In a womb" "In a box" "Into the Foetus Frightening Room" "In the machine that goes 'ping'" "What is the capital of Assyria?" "I don't know that!" "African or European?" "Blue" "I seek the Grail!" "What would you say to defeat the Knights Who Say Ni?" "Neee-wom" "A shrubbery" "Ecky-ecky-ecky-ecky-pikang-zoop-boing-goodem-zu-owly-zhiv" "It" "Find the Fish!" "In his trunk" "Wherever I go" "Inside the drawers in the bureau" "Hidden in his trousers" "Which one is NOT one of the Spanish Inquisition's chief weapons:" "fear and surprise" "ruthless efficiency" "nice purple uniforms" "an almost fanatical devotion to the Pope" "What is the name of this python:" "Type it her...Including the majestik møøse. A møøse once bit my sister and" "What CANNOT be found in the Dirty Hungarian Phrasebook?" "My hovercraft is full of eels" "You have beautiful thighs" "My nipples explode with delight" "Was ist das Won für Mittelschmerz?" "Finish the phrase: 'And now for something completely different...'" "Lucky aliens" "A man with a tape recorder up his nose" "Live organ transplants" "Every sperm is sacred" "According to Armaments, chapter two, verses nine to twenty-one, which shalt be the number thou shalt count?" "3" "5" "24" "42" "Mark all the options NOT offered by the Green Midget Cafe:" "Salmon Mousse and Spam" "Spam, egg, Spam, Spam, bacon and Spam" "Venezuelan Beaver Cheese, Spam, Spam, egg and Spam" "Egg and Spam" "Egg, bacon, sausage and Spam" "Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, wafer-thin mint, Spam, Spam, Spam and Spam" "Lobster Thermidor au Crevettes with a mornay sauce served in a Provencale manner with shallots and aubergines garnished with truffle pate, brandy and with a fried egg on top and Spam" "Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, baked beans, Spam, Spam, Spam and Spam" "Spam, Spam, Spam, egg and Spam" // Results "Congratulations!" "You did so well that you probably know The Meaning of Life! You're so clever that you could make into the Upper Class Twit of the Year or even play in the International Philosophy Football World Cup. And, finally, here are some completely gratuitous pictures of penises to annoy the censors and to hopefully spark some sort of controversy... (Just kidding, this is a SFW Trivia)" Average! No more, no less "You probably live the Dull Life of a City Stockbroker and you are OK with that. When trouble strikes and you need to save the day, you are ready to become... the BICYCLE REPAIR MAN!" "FAIL!" "I'm sure you didn't expect all that Spanish Inquisition, right? You will be thrown into the Gorge of Eternal Peril! But, first... let's see if you can handle THE COMFY CHAIR!" /420 // Buttons "Ask me the questions, bridgekeeper. \n I am not afraid." "Click for a tip" "Right. Off you go." "Try again (This is a silly trivia anyway)"
